Package org.mitre.synthea.export.rif

Class CodeMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.export.rif.CodeMapper
  • public class CodeMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for dealing with code mapping configuration writers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodeMapper

        public CodeMapper​(java.lang.String jsonMapResource)
        Create a new CodeMapper for the supplied JSON string.
        Parameters:
        jsonMapResource - resource path to a JSON mapping file. Expects the following format: 
         {
   "synthea_code": [ # each synthea code will be mapped to one of the codes in this array
     {
       "code": "BFD_code",
       "description": "Description of code", # optional
       "weight": "floating point value", # weighting used when selecting a code randomly
       "other field": "value of other field" # optional additional fields
     }
   ]
 }

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        public void merge​(CodeMapper other)
        Merge the mappings from the supplied code mapper. This method performs a deep merge such that destination codes will be merged if this and other contain mappings for the same source code. Care is required with the use of weights such that this and other use the same weighting scale (e.g. 0-1) otherwise one set of mappings could overwhelm the other.
        Parameters:
        other - the other code mapper from which mappings will be copied.

      • canMap

        public boolean canMap​(java.lang.String codeToMap)
        Determines whether this mapper has an entry for the supplied code.
        Parameters:
        codeToMap - the Synthea code to look for
        Returns:
        true if the Synthea code can be mapped to BFD, false if not

      • canMap

        public boolean canMap​(HealthRecord.Code codeToMap)
        Determines whether this mapper has an entry for the supplied code.
        Parameters:
        codeToMap - the Synthea code to look for
        Returns:
        true if the Synthea code can be mapped to BFD, false if not

      • map

        public java.lang.String map​(java.lang.String codeToMap,
                            RandomNumberGenerator rand)
        Get one of the BFD codes for the supplied Synthea code. Equivalent to map(codeToMap, "code", rand).
        Parameters:
        codeToMap - the Synthea code to look for
        rand - a source of random numbers used to pick one of the list of BFD codes
        Returns:
        the BFD code or null if the code can't be mapped

      • map

        public java.lang.String map​(java.lang.String codeToMap,
                            RandomNumberGenerator rand,
                            boolean stripDots)
        Get one of the BFD codes for the supplied Synthea code. Equivalent to map(codeToMap, "code", rand).
        Parameters:
        codeToMap - the Synthea code to look for
        rand - a source of random numbers used to pick one of the list of BFD codes
        stripDots - whether to remove dots in codes (e.g. J39.45 becomes J3945)
        Returns:
        the BFD code or null if the code can't be mapped

        public java.util.AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> mapToCodeAndDescription​(HealthRecord.Code codeToMap,

        Get one of the BFD codes for the supplied Synthea code. Equivalent to map(codeToMap, "code", rand).

        codeToMap - the Synthea code to look for
        rand - a source of random numbers used to pick one of the list of BFD codes

      • getMissingCodes

        public java.util.List<? extends java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getMissingCodes()
        Get the missing code as a list of maps, where each map includes the mapper name, a missing code, a description, and the count of times the code was requested.
